game.name: Brume
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A challenging action-adventure game. Explore a foggy abandoned island, fight knights, slugs and ghosts, and make your way to an old corrupted keep.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A challenging action-adventure game. Explore a foggy abandoned island, fight knights, slugs and ghosts, and make your way to an old corrupted keep.
game.developers: Sokpop Collective, Tom van den Boogaart
